isis.stitle: TSI 00-12-01 - Four-post compressor housing for all I6 engine applications

subjectgroup.subject: Four-post compressor housing for all I6 engine applications

geninfo.para:
Starting November 6, 2000, (serial number 1277933) International is releasing a four-post compressor housing to replace the three-post housings on all current and new I6 turbochargers. Current turbochargers will be serviced with the new four-post housing,
which will extend the fatigue life of ported shroud turbochargers by eliminating the possibility of compressor blade resonance. This change has no effect on engine performance or emissions, and does not effect regularly scheduled service intervals. International continues to use ported shroud turbochargers on engine application 230BHP and higher.
